|rad1oui = |rad1_ant_conn = U.FL |rad1txchains = 2 |rad1rxchains = 2 |rad1sstreams = 2 |rad1stand = IEEE 802.11a/n/ac |rad1ac = 867 |rad1n = 300 |rad1a = 54 |rad1freq = 5 |wi2_if_name = |rad2chip1 = Realtek;RTL8192CE; |rad2oui = |rad2_ant_conn = U.FL |rad2txchains = 2 |rad2rxchains = 2 |rad2sstreams = 2 |rad2stand = IEEE 802.11b/g/n |rad2n = 300 |rad2g = 54 |rad2b = 11 |rad2freq = 2.4 }}{{TIDTOC|embedded}} ==Overview== The FCC test report indicates that the ''Edimax'' GR-478AC
and the ''ZyXEL'' X650 are also covered by the same FCC ID. *"1244-010000842-50Z" is silkscreened on the main board of the FCC EUT. :"1244-00000861-50Z_ES" is silkscreened on the wireless module of the same device. *"1244-010000892-50Z" is silkscreened on the main board of a production model. :"1244-00000861-50Z" is silkscreened on the wireless module of the same device. This device is likely using RTL8367R as the Switch IC. By default, the device broadcasts the SSID of '''edimax.setup''' on both bands. *The power adapter included with the device is likely a '''DVE''' :DSA-12PFA-05 FUS 050200 (100-240V 50/60Hz, 0.5A -> 5VDC 2A). ==Links of Interest== [http://www.edimax.com/en/produce_detail.php?pd_id=484&pl1_id=3&pl2_id=18 Product page] {{â€¢}} [http://www.edimax.com/images/Image/datasheet/Wireless/BR-6478AC/BR-6478AC_Datasheet_v4_2013Feb25.pdf Datasheet] ===Reviews=== *[http://www.smallnetbuilder.com/wireless/wireless-reviews/32219-edimax-br-6478ac-ac1200-wireless-concurrent-dual-band-gigabit-router-reviewed?start=1 Reviewed on '''SmallNetBuilder'''] *[http://vr-zone.com/articles/edimax-br-6478ac-dual-band-router-review/19856.html Reviewed on '''VR-Zone'''] *[http://www.netcheif.com/Reviews/BR-6478AC/BR-6478AC.htm Reviewed on '''NetCheif'''] :CPU: [[Realtek]] [http://www.netcheif.com/Reviews/BR-6478AC/PDF/8197D.pdf RTL8197D] @660MHz :Switch: [[Realtek]] [http://www.realtek.com.tw/products/productsView.aspx?Langid=1&PNid=18&PFid=15&Level=5&Conn=4&ProdID=300 RTL8367RB] GbE :RAM: ''Nanya'' [http://www.netcheif.com/Reviews/BR-6478AC/PDF/NT5TU32M16DG.pdf NT5TU32M16DG] 64MB :Flash: ''Macronix'' [http://www.netcheif.com/Reviews/BR-6478AC/PDF/25L3206E.pdf MX25L3206E] 4MB :WLAN 2.4GHz: [[Realtek]] [http://www.realtek.com.tw/products/productsView.aspx?Langid=1&PFid=48&Level=5&Conn=4&ProdID=278 RTL8192CE] 2T2R 802.11bgn :WLAN 5GHz: [[Realtek]] RTL8812AR 2T2R 802.11ac :USB: 2x USB 2.0 (unpopulated, unsoldered) ==JTAG-Serial Info== ===Serial=== ====Serial Pinouts==== The pinout used would seem to be a standard one used by ''Edimax''.. 
J1 [3.3] (RxD) (GND) (TxD)

----> to PCIe WI module
